entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix and clean up the handling of "must contain" `LEA`s on ARM64 #74448
    8.0.0
  • Native crash in System.Text.Json.Tests in mono Linux x64 #74443
  • [Perf] ubuntu 18.04/x64 : Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Byte> on 8/18/2022 3:00:51 AM #74437
  • [NativeAot] List<T> in options pattern not work in nativeaot mode #74436
  • Process exits silently with FailFastException thrown in Thread::StaticInitialize #74432
    Future
  • [wasm] Clean up environment helpers duplicated from emscripten #74423
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run binaries located on network shares #74418
  • ClientWebSocket options are potentially silently ignored in case an invoker is passed #74416
    7.0.0
  • Potential premature dispose of HTTP/2 connection in ClientWebSocket #74415
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests fails #74413
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests fail #74411
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser test fails #74409
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.XmlSchemaSet.Tests fail #74408
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.XmlSchema.XmlSchemaValidatorApi.Tests fail #74407
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.RW.XmlSystemPathResolver.Tests fail #74406
    8.0.0
  • Tar: archive creation should detect hard links to same file #74404
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 reading standard output blocks on Linux #74402
  • Fail to get_free_region in thread_final_regions due to low memory for mark array might lead to AV. #74401
    7.0.0
  • Directories created by extracting from a tar file do not have timestamps set #74398
    8.0.0
  • UTF-8 marshalling of string fields is broken #74394
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Spmi-diff is showing diffs that are not related to the PR #74287
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbWeight == BB_ZERO_WEIGHT' in 'Castle.DynamicProxy.Contributors.ProxyInstanceContributor:ImplementProxyTargetAccessor(Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.ClassEmitter,Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.SimpleAST.FieldReference):this' during 'Invert loops' #74218
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\valuetypes\\nullable\\castclass\\null\\castclass-null019\\castclass-null019.cmd #74206
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\DivConst_r\\DivConst_r.cmd #74044
    7.0.0
  • Official build failed on linux-musl-arm64 due to NRE in crossgen2 #69454
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72389
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Rate Limiter #65400
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #74319
  • F5 to run Blazor WebAssembly App project, register and log in on the web page, then log out, click login again, the web page will be crash. #74064
  • Need to run non-English text through UTF8Encoding for PGO scenarios #57698
    7.0.0
  • Tar: behavior for symbolic links to directories #74214
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_Cancellation_Test_NonParallel.CancelPendingRequest_DropsStalledConnectionAttempt #72977
    7.0.0
  • Is it possible to create a x509Certificate2 with the CA, client.cert and client.key? #74250
    Future
  • Impersonation via Kerberos and HttpClient leads to TCP port exhaustion #74078
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding for Greek and Cyrillic #52313
    8.0.0
  • [android][debugger] Debugger doesn't work on emulator when a VPN is involved #74429
  • clr build fails on Windows ARM64 #74375
  • [arm64 Linux] SIGSEGV when trying to run any tests build locally #74403
  • reference binding to null pointer caught by ubsan #74284
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'srcInterval->registerType == registerType' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm.Helpers:BitwiseSelect(float,float,float):float' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #74373
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51398
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests fail on Android #50575
    Future
  • .NET 7 exception on Android with EnableLLVM=true #73003
    7.0.0
  • Xml_TypeWithReadOnlyMyCollectionProperty failing on CI #1395
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonOptional attribute for properties that may or may not be present when serialized/deserialized. #74285
  • HttpClient.DefaultProxy doesn't understand socks when populated from an environment variable #71215
    8.0.0
  • `TarEntry.ExtractToFile` does not set the last write time of the file to the local time #73825
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest #74127
    7.0.0
  • [debugger] CORDBG_E_MISSING_METADATA error when inspecting EF Core classes in .Net 6 #68929
    8.0.0
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectory() doesn't work sometimes with compressed archives #74242
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Int128/Int128TestFieldLayout/Int128TestFieldLayout.sh #74318
    7.0.0
  • AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #62145
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->lvaCallSpCheck != 0xCCCCCCCC && compiler->lvaGetDesc(compiler->lvaCallSpCheck)->lvDoNotEnregister && compiler->lvaGetDesc(compiler->lvaCallSpCheck)->lvOnFrame' in 'Test_skippage5_cs.Program:Test(C):int' during 'Generate code' #74129
    7.0.0
  • [R2R] Debug assert failing for condition that is definitely true #74253
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage (#74300) #74464
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix symlink detection in tests #74462
    area-System.IO
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix issues found in recent Int128 ABI change #74460
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/7.0] [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74458
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix write barriers in NativeAOT #74455
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Disable failing Globalization and Transactions tests #74454
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1][mini] double quote linker path in defined(LD_NAME) case #74453
    blocking-release, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mini] double quote linker path in defined(LD_NAME) case #74451
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] Backport tar bug fixes and improvements #74449
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] Disable VerifyXmlResolver test. #74447
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle package #74445
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable failing Globalization and Transactions tests #74433
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • Expose JsonSerializer.IsReadOnly and MakeReadOnly() APIs. #74431
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve windows hardware exception handling performance #74426
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Collect SPMI for TechEmpower benchmarks #74420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] simple perf tests for JavaScript interop #74419
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Fix missing cross-origin headers when running the browser-eventpipe sample #74410
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix setting weight for inverted loop condition block #74444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change superpmi.py collect default to not clean/verify MCH #74438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #74300
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix issues found in recent Int128 ABI change #74386
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74434
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #74367
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Backport: work around GitHub .patch URL issue #74452
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix RegexExperiment.ViewSampleRegexInDGML test #74397
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Add Fedora 38 RID #74377
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add tests for exotic external tar asset archives, fix some more corner case bugs #74412
    area-System.IO
  • Disable VerifyXmlResolver test. #74417
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Skip directory symlink recursion on TarFile archive creation #74376
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Improve DOTNET_JitDisasm and introduce DOTNET_JitDisasmSummary #74392
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: finish converting all phases to use common post phase dumps and checks #74308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74350
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rewrite PendingConnectionTimeout tests #74427
    area-System.Net.Http
  • #50575 default case color behaviour is enabled #74349
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix strnstr in jitconfig.cpp #74421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable new tests about JMC in Firefox #74344
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable HTTP & SSL stress runs on release/7.0 #74422
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove undefined dereference of `null` #74378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use the regType for extracting the RegisterType #74399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `lvOverlappingFields` #72356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • support using socks proxy through env vars #74369
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove assert from Http3Connection.SendAsync #74348
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Set modified timestamps on files being extracted from tar archives #74400
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix mono package versions during stabilization #74368
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm-mt] Fix cross-origin headers when running the browser threads sample test #74342
    area-Build-mono
  • SkipBlockAlignmentPadding must be executed for all entries #74396
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #74389
    EventPipe, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix per-call stack checks on x86 #74283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update workload manifest paths #74364
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Reenable class-memaccess warning #74363
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] improve samples #74371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74379
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Handle Timer jitter #74360
    area-System.Threading
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-consider, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [docs] begin documenting how to use EventPipe-based profiled AOT for Mono #72864
    documentation, area-Tracing-mono
  • Enable Console Logging test in NativeAOT #74381
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Draft of optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update OutOfMemoryException message #74374
    area-VM-coreclr
